properties.areaDesc: Foothills of the Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon
properties.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 15 at 1:21PM PST until January 15 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Pendleton OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...South winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts to 50 mph expected.

* WHERE...Foothills of the Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon.

* WHEN...Until 10 PM PST this evening.

* IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects.
Blowing snow is likely which will reduce visibility on roadways.
Slow down if you encounter areas of blowing snow.
properties.instruction:
Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high
profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

NWSheadline: WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PST THIS EVENING
